### DATA ###

########## CONVERT TO TIBBLE

SEA_lanes_final <- readRDS("data/seattle/SEA_lanes_final.rds") # some have same info but different geo for walkshed
SEA_lanes_final <- readRDS("data/seattle/complete/SEA_lanes_final.rds")

### REMOVE TRANSFORM
SEA_walksheds <- readRDS("data/seattle/SEA_walksheds.rds")

sub <- crop(SEA_walksheds, extent(st_bbox(SEA_boundary)))

spTransform((SEA_walksheds %>%
    select(walk_15) %>% 
    st_as_sf() %>% 
    st_make_valid() %>% 
    summarize(walk_15 = st_union(walk_15)))$walk_15, 4480)

st_as_sf(spTransform(as_Spatial((SEA_walksheds %>%
    select(walk_15) %>% 
    st_as_sf() %>% 
    st_make_valid() %>% 
    summarize(walk_15 = st_union(walk_15)))$walk_15) %>% 
  crop(., extent(st_bbox(SEA_boundary))), 
  CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0")))


st_as_sf(spTransform(as_Spatial((SEA_walksheds %>%
    select(walk_15) %>% 
    st_as_sf() %>% 
    st_make_valid() %>% 
    summarize(walk_15 = st_union(walk_15)))$walk_15) %>% 
  crop(., extent(st_bbox(SEA_boundary))), 
  CRS("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0"))) %>% mapview()


SEA_boundary <- readRDS("data/seattle/SEA_boundary.rds")

SEA_elections_odd <- readRDS("data/seattle/SEA_elections_odd.rds")    # local races
SEA_elections_even <- readRDS("data/seattle/SEA_elections_even.rds")  # federal races

```{r}
### FIGURES: MAPS ###

sea_fig1 <- SEA_elections_odd %>% st_as_sf() %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = turnout_diff_oc1)) + theme_void() + 
  scale_fill_fermenter(palette = "RdYlGn", direction = 1, n.breaks = 6,
                       labels = c("-0.15" = "-0.15", "0.10" = "", 
                                  "-0.05" = "-0.05", "0.00" = "", 
                                  "0.05" = "0.05")) + 
  labs(fill = expression(paste(Delta, " turnout"))) + 
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
        legend.position = "bottom")

sea_fig2 <- SEA_elections_odd %>% st_as_sf() %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(aes(fill = turnout_diff_oc2)) + theme_void() + 
  scale_fill_fermenter(palette = "RdYlGn", direction = 1, n.breaks = 6,
                       labels = c("0" = "0.00", "0.05" = "", 
                                  "0.1" = "0.10", "0.15" = "", 
                                  "0.2" = "0.20")) + 
  labs(fill = expression(paste(Delta, " turnout"))) + 
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
        legend.position = "bottom")

sea_fig3 <- SEA_elections_odd %>% st_as_sf() %>% ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(fill = "aliceblue") + theme_void() + 
  geom_sf(data = st_as_sf(spTransform(as_Spatial((SEA_walksheds %>%
                      select(walk_15) %>% 
                      st_as_sf() %>% 
                      st_make_valid() %>% 
                      summarize(walk_15 = st_union(walk_15)))$walk_15) %>% 
                    crop(., extent(st_bbox(SEA_boundary))), 
                    CRS(paste0("+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs", 
                               "+ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0")))) %>% 
            mutate(type = "15-min.\nwalkshed"), 
          aes(fill = type), alpha = 0.75) + 
  scale_fill_manual(values = "red", name = "") + 
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA),
        legend.position = "bottom",
        legend.box.margin = margin(0, 0, 10, 0))

ggsave("figures/sea/sea_fig1.png", sea_fig1, width = 3, height = 5, dpi = 200)
ggsave("figures/sea/sea_fig2.png", sea_fig2, width = 3, height = 5, dpi = 200)
ggsave("figures/sea/sea_fig3.png", sea_fig3, width = 3, height = 5, dpi = 200)

```
